title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8101.01 - City of Albany
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8101.01 - City of Albany

State Regulations
(a) [Repealed]
(b) Church Street. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Church Street from within the Port of

Albany complex to the southerly entrance ramp to IR 787. (c) Washington Avenue. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Washington Avenue between Fuller Road and the IR 90
eastbound entrance ramp. (d) -(e)
[Repealed]
(f) US Route 9 and 20. The eastbound and westbound roadways of US Route 9 and 20 from the City of

Rensselaer/City of Albany line to IR 787. (g) Prospect Road. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Prospect Road from Terminal Street to a point
approximately 0.17+- mile east of Terminal Street. (h) Terminal Street. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Terminal Street from Prospect Road to Commerce Avenue, a
distance of 0.14+- mile. (i) Commerce Avenue. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Commerce Avenue from

Terminal Street to Watervliet Road Extension, a distance of 0.55+-
mile. (j) Watervliet Road

Extension. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Watervliet Road Extension
from Commerce Avenue to Everett Road, a distance of 0.27+- mile. (k) Everett Road. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Everett Road from Watervliet Road Extension and the IR
90 entrance and exit ramps, a distance of 0.11+- mile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8101.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
